data.description:
This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

Simply Digital 3 brings all the information you need to know in one single face. See the battery status at a glance, get the current temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius, and shake your wrist to see what tomorrow's weather will be. View the time and date. And lastly view another timezone's time or the current weather condition.

Features:
-Battery status
-Shake to view tomorrow's weather
-Fixed location weather (No smartphone GPS required)
-Toggle on/off the additional time zone
-Change the background color, main color, and accent color

Enjoy!

Team Kiezel-
data.title: Simply Digital 3

data.description:
Simple analog watch face with big date.
The date and week texts will move to avoid overlapping with hands.

The following items are customizable.
- Second hand style (none/ball/line)
- Second hand color
- Hour/minute hands style
- Hour/minute hands color
- Date/Week color
- Date/Week font size
- Background (black/white)

Please feel free to send me any suggestions on github.

https://github.com/yoshimov/pebble-bigdate/issues

日付を大きく表示する時計です。日付と曜日は針に重ならないように移動します。
針の形、色、日付、曜日の大きさ、背景の色を変更できます。

data.description:
Do you know "The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People"?
(See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_7_Habits_of_Highly_Effective_People)
I understood these simple principles well, but it is very hard to make it a habit.
So, I have to be able to see it anywhere, anytime.
This application change the habit that is displayed every minute.

I hope this application is useful for you! Have fun!

data.description:
Spocks (short for SPinning clOCKS, not related with the character from StarTrek, although I like to think he'd enjoy the watchface!) fills your Pebble screen with small analog watches that will animate to create a shape to display a digital clock and other data.

Fully configurable, you can make the face your own by changing, between others:
  · Colors for every section
  · Vibration settings (on Bluetooth status change and hourly)
  · 24h/12h
  · Leading 0 on the hours hidden or shown
  · Shake the watch to show the date (dd/mm or mm/dd), seconds, battery and/or bluetooth status.

The seconds are shown on the right, and each level represents a value between 5 seconds, the first one from 0 to 4 (like the third image shows), the second from 5 to 9... until 55 to 59 (the second image, animated shows this level before the animation).

On the left, the first two places represent the bluetooth status. When they point towards each other (like the third image) it is connected. If they point in different directions, then Bluetooth connection is lost. Underneath the bluetooth, the battery level can be found, each level for each tenth of the battery level, starting at 100% on top and finishing at 10% or 0% depending on the shape. The third image shows a battery level of 50%.

I hope you enjoy this watchface based on a design found in a hotel in London (Ham Yard Hotel). Please let me know if there is anyway I can improve it.
data.title: Spocks

data.description:
Note see new watchface Jupter Mass Xen, which has a slightly bigger font for time.

Simple digital watchface that updates once a minute. For Basalt (Time) and Aplite (Pebble).
Includes battery status.
Displays when Bluetooth connection is lost and optionally vibrates
Configurable color for time (date) and background - Basalt (Pebble Time) ONLY

Acknowledgements
  * Font ISL Jupiter by Isurus Labs (http://www.dafont.com/isl-jupiter.font)
  * N7 Logo Vector by Karlika (http://karlika.deviantart.com/art/Mass-Effect-Vector-Pack-178422616)
  * html/js for color configuration based on code by https://github.com/rgarth

latest_release.release_notes:
Background color can now be set on Basalt.
Config now uses Slate - https://github.com/pebble/slate

data.title: Jupiter Mass

data.author: clach04

changelog.release_notes: Clay support (with Pebble 3.13 offline config is now possible).

Initial Chalk/Round support.
Uses latest watchface framework, https://github.com/clach04/watchface_framework/
Initial release on AppStore

data.description:
Basic digital watch face for the Pebble smartwatch. Features:
  * Updates once per minute
  * Includes battery status
  * Supports Aplite (original Pebble), Basalt (Pebble Time), and Chalk (Pebble Time Round)
  * Displays when Bluetooth connection is lost and optionally vibrates
  * Configurable color for time and date - Basalt (Pebble Time) ONLY

Acknowledgements

  * Fonts by Isurus Labs
      * ISL Jupiter - http://www.dafont.com/isl-jupiter.font
      * ISL AlphaBot Xen- http://www.dafont.com/isl-alphabot-xen.font)
  * N7 Logo Vector by Karlika (http://karlika.deviantart.com/art/Mass-Effect-Vector-Pack-178422616)
  * html/js for color configuration based on code by https://github.com/rgarth and Slate https://github.com/pebble/slate

Also see Jupiter Mass (same watchface, slightly different font).

latest_release.release_notes: Clay support (with Pebble 3.13 offline config is now possible).

data.title: Jupiter Mass Xen

data.description:
A variant of Rock Paper Scissors, invented by Sam Kass and popularized on the TV Show, "The Big Bang Theory".

RULES:
Scissors cuts Paper
Paper covers Rock
Rock crushes Lizard
Lizard poisons Spock
Spock smashes Scissors
Scissors decapitates Lizard
Lizard eats Paper
Paper disproves Spock
Spock vaporizes Rock
Rock crushes scissors

A tap or shake of the watch randomly changes the image.

Donate: 1JbxfRpG4iv3qscRe8wgFBXbNhmPesP723

latest_release.release_notes: 1.3 - Added support for Pebble 2 Diorite and Pebble Time 2 Emery.

data.title: LizardSpock

data.author: Pierre Crette

changelog.release_notes:
v1.6
Battery usage improved by removing second hand and having the watch do nothing all minutes long. From 3.5 days to 5.5 days in my own usage.
BlueTooth alert. It seems usefull to me now since I mute my phone.
v1.5 Battery optimisation to keep our Pebble far from a plug longer
V 1.4. Work on both basalte and aplite.
BigAnalog White 1.3 includes a move of date cadran around quarter past X.

Bug correction on day.
Hide day or weekday when hand come above.

Big Analog White is a watchface for people like me that requires glasses to read small characters. Big date, long hands and neat design are the moto of this watchface. Also, no BT or weather here in case you want to wear your pebble disconnected.
This v1.1 version uses white background and colorful hands.

data.description: Big Analog watchface is a watchface for people like me that requires glasses to read small characters. Big date, long hands and neat design are the moto of this watchface. Also BT alert and watch battery.

v1.6
Battery usage improved by removing second hand and having the watch do nothing all minutes long. From 3.5 days to 5.5 days in my own usage.

data.description:
Top circle represents the day, midnight at the bottom noon at the top. The loop is 24-hour and the triangle tick is 12-hour. The diamonds are sunrise and sunset.

Bottom circle represents an hour, 60-minute loop.

Date and weather on the left side.

Features:
- Custom colors
- Weather with icons
- Sunrise & sunset indicators
- Custom GPS location
- Battery status
- 12 and 24 hour display
- Bluetooth connection loss

latest_release.release_notes: - Added: ability to have hour clock with noon low and midnight high (default is opposite)

data.description:
No silly animations - no unnecessary information.

Just the time! ( and the date if you want to )

Stymple's key features are:

* colors are completely customizable 
* anti-aliased digits for smooth appearance
* optional date and battery state 
* haptic and visual notification of Bluetooth changes
* localized date format for all supported languages 
* 12 hour format support 
* low energy consumption

data.author: James Price

changelog.release_notes: -Fixed GPS always defaulting to text location.
Resolved issue where weather wasn't updating automatically due to SDK changes.
-Battery bar more accurate
Fixed issue with detecting missing default values for location

-Removed the message loop that happened at 00 & 30. (Bad for battery) 
-Added default values for first time users. It will default to location services with Montreal Canada as the backup.
Fixed error with blank data due to GPS not being found.

Added battery charge level bar
Added support in configuration for Celsius and Fahrenheit
GPS can now be used for location
-Added API key for weather call. Temperatures should update correctly now.
-When weather update fails it will retry up to 5 times with a delay between retries of 2mins.

-Fixed weather update looplock at 00 and 30. (very bad for battery life)
-Not setting a location will default to Montreal Canada instead of GMT.
First release

A pixel art inspired, downsampled grid, analog watch-face with anti-aliased hour, minute, second hands. Colors and other display functionality are configurable.

Includes battery level, date indicator.
Tap/shake to display current temperature, and day of the week.

data.description: Zen for Me is my customization of Richard Gilbert's Zen for Steel.  I put the day of the month at the top of the frame and it is symmetrically positioned opposite the "pebble" logo at the bottom of the Pebble Steel frame.  The analog watchface is centered on the glass face.  I've removed the second hand and included bluetooth disconnect notification (vibration and no-bluetooth icon when connection is lost).

data.description:
The outer twelve segments indicate the hours, the five large inner segments show 10 minute groups and the nine smaller segments are the single minutes.
  
All colors are configurable.  
  
Screenshots show:  
(1) 12:59  
(2) 08:23 
(3) 05:37
(4) 07:54 (with Quick View)
   
This design was created by László Scheffer and originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio.  It is published with the designer's permission, and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.  

The original design can be found here:  
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2013/04/25/1259-block-design-update/

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble Time 2.  Requires Pebble firmware V4.3 or later.

data.description:
Companion Android APP : 
(only Chinese and English version) 
http://yun.baidu.com/wap/view?fsid=1052957113551207

This watchface, ACT monitor, will show U the information as below:

1. Date, Time, weather and battery %,
    weather updates every hour.
2. the total steps U taked till now today.
3. the total time of sleep, seating, walking, jogging U taked till now today.
4. the activity and the elapsed time of it U take right now.
5. buzz U every 60min for seating and 15min for jogging, no buzz for sleep and walking.
6. "till now today" means from 21:00 to now, all the data will become zero at 21:00 everyday.

Some code to deal with Accelerometer Data is obtained from open source of GITHUB.
data.title: ACT monitor

changelog.release_notes: sdk 3.6 app msg issues fixed

well that was shortlived. openweathermap's current data is screwed up again, using forecast data instead.
use openweathermap api key
for some reason openweathermap's current data got a lot more accurate, switching back from using forecasts
dude, little bits of clouds is not straight up cloudy
disrespect time restrictions on getting new weather if location changes drastically
restore background change every 5 minutes, do retry for weather if blank is rendered every minute instead of every 15

use forecast 3 hours into future instead of current weather because openweathermap is hugely inaccurate with current weather
ping phone every 15 minutes instead of 5 to save battery
fixed iphone weather issue
adding bad weather bug report mechanism
clear night sky starts at 8pm and ends at 6am
low battery is now white because red too close to orange
more weather edge cases
better weather corner cases
fixing weather layer sometimes not loading
Fix rain icon
make the battery level threshold actually 20%
always send cached weather even if fetching new weather

data.description:
Watchface based on Persona 4 Golden. Day of week will turn white when battery is less than 20%, and bottom left indicator will turn red if Bluetooth connection is lost. Character background randomly chosen on startup and every 5 subsequent minutes. No memory leaks.

OpenWeatherMap has a tendency to always report Haze in coastal locations. I cannot do anything about it but file a bug report with them, which I did.

If the weather circle is empty, OpenWeatherMap is returning an unrecognized weather code. An automatic report mechanism is built in and I will take a look as soon as possible.

I no longer have a Pebble Time, so no new development will be made. There are no memory leaks or bugs I'm aware of.

Using some assets from Th3Laugh1ngMan's Rainmeter skin.
SHIN MEGAMI TENSEI, SMT, and Persona are registered trademarks of Atlus U.S.A., Inc.
Using OpenWeatherMap data. A.K.A. the reason why the icons are sometimes wildly inaccurate.
data.title: Persona 4 Golden

data.author: AngerDanger

changelog.release_notes: Added ability to invert text color by flicking wrist within first two seconds of launching the watchface.

data.description:
Requested by Marcos Avila, inspired by Windows live tiles, and developed with EffectLayer and the font Forced Square.

Tiles flip to show the new time every minute. A flick of the wrist reveals the date, and the tile color can be customized. Text color can be inverted within two seconds of launching the watchface by a wrist flick.

Feel free to like this watchface. Like, I mean you /can/ like it if you'd like—what I'm trying to say is that you don't have to absolutely hate this watchface like usual. I'm leaving your feelings up to you.

latest_release.release_notes: Added ability to invert text color by flicking wrist within first two seconds of launching the watchface.

data.title: Metro Flip

data.author: Mike Prorock

changelog.release_notes: Now with Seconds!
added caching for weather and a few other improvements
Updated an issue with fetching weather due to changes on the open weather api
Fixed weather sync
Fixed a minor issue with weather not being always set.
Updated several misc internal code items.  Disabled debugging output codes.  Disabled some vibrartions during quiet time.
cleaned up some code and resources to decrease footprint.  bt/battery text will go red in warning states.
Fixed a small memory leak related to font unloading
Another minor update restructuring code for an optimal config.  Also set compass to toggle on shake rather than just relying on a timeout to switch back off.
Some updates in preparation for configuration
Initial build.  Largely optimized around battery life and minimal resource utilization.

data.description: WatchInfo is a lightweight, text based watch face that displays key information at a glance.  Time (of course), date, compass heading and direction, weather, location, and battery/bluetooth status.  This was developed to scratch an itch for an all purpose, low battery drain watch face for hiking, camping, and all around usage.  No configuration for now, though that is likely to change.  Tap/Shake will enable compass, which will then go back to sleep when activity is not detected.  Between 10pm and 6am, a low power mode is engaged, stopping the second blink, and requiring a triple tap or vigorous shake to re-enable the compass.  Weather is synced on the hour.
data.title: WatchInfo

data.description:
The sequel of the watch face "Straight" is here! Nobody escapes from "Straight", so welcome to the "Straightscape" watch face.

+ 4 Landscapes: Beach, Mountain, City, and Space. And they change with the weather condition and day/night.

+ 3 ways of use:
- Select 1 theme: Go straight and select the landscape where you are or what you like.
- Random: Select your favorites and set the time for a random landscape change.
- Automatic: Smart logic top secret algorithm, which select the appropiate landscape depending on day of the week and current time.

+ INFO: Time, day, battery charge (subtle), weather temperature, weather condition, vibration on disconnect/reconnect, and phone disconnected indicator (subtle).
data.title: Straightscape

data.author: Charles Tatum II
data.description: Simple. Clear. Refined. Basic Black is a Pebble watchface that gives you everything you want, in a direct, straightforward layout. The time, including seconds, month, date and day are presented and, when location is activated, the local temperature from the National Weather Service (degrees Fahrenheit, targeted at USA).

data.description:
Classic minute repeater. No need to look at your watch or phone. With a flick of the wrist the watch tells you the time with a discrete vibration pattern :

First  a series of long vibes per hour (max 12).
Next a series of double vibes per quarter (max 3).
And lastly a series of short pulses per minute.

Other features are battery load (in the 9 marker) and BT connection warning (9 marker turns red with configurable buzz). Optional second hand. Night mode option for low light environments.
data.title: Minute Repeater

data.author: Rossmallow

changelog.release_notes:
A watch face that displays the current period and when it ends on the regular bell schedule at Niles West High School.

User Guide:
"Period", along with stating numbers that correspond with the current period, also states letters for other indicators.

B = Before School
E = Early Bird
H = Home Room
A = After School

The watch face does not show passing period. As soon as one period ends "Period" will state the period of your next class, to remind you of your destination.

On weekends "Period" will show "-" which indicates that there is no current period.

After school and on weekends "Ends" and "Time Left" will show "--:--" to indicate that there is no period to end.

https://github.com/Rossmallow/NW-Schedule-Watchface/blob/master/src/main.c

v1.0
Probably my one and only release.

data.author: marwan

changelog.release_notes: Fixed name in JSON.

data.description:
White digits on a fading background.  

Background colours change depending on battery and Bluetooth state.  

Battery: 
- 10% to 30% = red fade 
- 40% to 60% = yellow fade 
- 70% to 100% = green fade  

Bluetooth: 
- On = lower two bars blue 
- Off = no blue   

If any comments or issues let me know!

*** Note: When plugged in the displayed battery level can be lower than the actual level, e.g. yellow instead of green. This appears to be due to an inherent feature of the Pebble so I'll try to implement a workaround in a future release.
data.title: Fade

data.author: Bira

changelog.release_notes: Bug fix release
Bug fix release

This version of Plastic-Functional introduces estimated remaining battery time!
Pebble's battery lifetime is so amazing that just knowing that its battery is at 20% may know be enough. It would be very handy to know those 20% mean another 2 days of battery time.

Two days or two hours, it all depends on how much you stress your pebble. But don't worry, Plastic-Functional will keep re-estimating the remaining time based on your usages in the last few hours. Smoothing out the outliers, of course ;)

Well, enjoy!!
This version fixes a problem with overlapping text when using 12h clock.

data.description:
Clean and effective Watchface with battery level and status indicator. Designed to be very, very light on resource utilization.

Newsflash!!! 
Pebble's battery lifetime is so amazing that just knowing that its battery is at 20% may know be enough. It would be very handy to know those 20% mean another 2 days of battery time.

Two days or two hours, it all depends on how much you stress your pebble. But don't worry, Plastic-Functional will keep re-estimating the remaining time based on your usages in the last few hours. Smoothing out the outliers, of course ;)

Since it's based on your last usage, it could take a few hours for the estimated time to show up. So don't give up!!

Well, enjoy!!
data.title: Plastic - Functional

data.description:
Jednoduchý ciferník s vlajkou Slovenskej Republiky a digitálnym dátumom a časom. "Ukáž sa!"

★ Verzia 2.0 s konfiguráciou je tu ★
★ Úplne vový design všetkých ikon ★
★ Zatras pre zobrazenie dátumu ★
❤︎ Nezabudni: páči = daj srdiečko! ❤︎

Ciferník je univerzálny - zobrazuje sa čiernobielo na originálnych Pebble hodinkách a farebne na Time hodinkách. 

Zdravím všetkých, ktorí si stiahli tento ciferník do Pebble aplikácie.

English
Simple watchface featuring Slovak Republic's flag and digital date/time. 

★ Version 2.0 with preferences ★
★ All icons completely re-designed ★
★ Tap (shake) to show date ★
❤︎ Give it a GO, give it a HEART! ❤︎

Watchface is universal - shows in black-and-white on Classic / Steel and in colour on Time / Steel. 

Greetings to all who downloaded this watchface!
